Reviews.Title: ipro i7320
Reviews.Author: riley
Reviews.Content: peice of junk ear volume terrible spkr volume same 97%of calls failed to connect strt.talk sim either att or t mobile .all total useless of junk.oh can`t adj volume only gave 1 star because can`t rate 0 star to post comment.shipping was good but dealer should be ashamed to sell this crap can1t get refund had towait for my other time to run out on other phone.also memory lock fell out was loose when it arrived can`t put back inand memory doesn`t recognize memory card.JUNK!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: gooooooooooooooooooood
Reviews.Author: jose
Reviews.Content: esta ha sido una buena compra,  un aparato realmente sorprendente a un bajo precio,  con buena camara y pantalla muy funcional
